DOC.detailed_description: Investigators test hypothesis chronic restoration parasympathetic nervous system ( PNS ) activity central acetylcholinesterase inhibitor improve insulin sensitivity reduces adipose tissue oxidation obese African American woman ( AAW ) compare white woman ( WW ) . A cross-over study perform matched cohort AAW white woman subject chronic central acetylcholinesterase inhibition galantamine versus placebo , give orally 4-week period . Insulin sensitivity measure use gold standard hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp . Adipose tissue obtain subcutaneous fat biopsy F2-isoprostanes quantify .
